*div1 type="summary"* *p*Walter Turnbull to Austin, Pinckneyville, October 13, 1831, Depression in United States, Slave insurrections in Virginia and North Carolina. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Pinckney Ville*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-13-1831">13. Oct. 1831*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*My dear Sir;*/p*
*p*When I parted with you, I believe I informed you that my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*would be in *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1831">December */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="01-xx-132">January*/date_mentioned*, but since my return *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned*, I find it will be impossible for me to do so, I will not be able to remove them before *date_mentioned n="04-xx-1832">April */date_mentioned*or *date_mentioned n="05-xx-1832">May*/date_mentioned*, I shall however be in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* with my property in *date_mentioned n="12-xx-1831">December*/date_mentioned*, when I shall make a location and commence erecting Cabins etc. the object of making this communication is a desire on my part not to deceive you as to the time I shall have my *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*in the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*. This letter will be handed you by *person_mentioned*Doct. Phelps*/person_mentioned* who sets out on *date_mentioned n="10-16-1831">Sunday next */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*San Felippe de Austin*/location_mentioned* and will be followed in the course of the *date_mentioned n="Winter - 1831">winter */date_mentioned*by his *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*, who owing to the unusual unhealthiness of this and *location_mentioned*Louisiana */location_mentioned*consider it unsafe to attempt to travel before *date_mentioned n="WInter - 1831">winter*/date_mentioned*— This whole *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*has been visited with a dreadful Gale of Wind and a great deal of rain which has cut the crops of Cotton and sugar off more than one half and I have no doubt there are a great many *location_mentioned*plantations */location_mentioned*that will not make more than expences— In *location_mentioned*Virginia*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*North Carolina*/location_mentioned* they have had an insurrection of the *person_mentioned*negroes*/person_mentioned*, who before their progress were stopped butchered 70 or 80 *person_mentioned*persons*/person_mentioned*, say *person_mentioned*men */person_mentioned**person_mentioned*women */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*spareing neither age nor sex— Serious apprehensions are entertained of an Insurrection of the *person_mentioned*blacks */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*Louisiana */location_mentioned*particularly in the latter state, the people are on the *person_mentioned*qui vive patroles*/person_mentioned* are moving at all hours and I think it impractable, even should they make the attempt to do much mischief*/p*
*p*I have not seen a well day since I left *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, I have had an attack of Jaundice,—I have taken the liberty of sending you by *person_mentioned*Doct, Phelps*/person_mentioned* a few late *location_mentioned*News papers*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Walter Turnbul*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Colonel Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felippe de Austin Texas */location_mentioned* Favd. by *person_mentioned*doct. Phelps*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
